Attendance Views¶

attendance.views.attendance_query(request, form, course)[source]¶

Renders the data about students with attendance greater/lesser than a value

Parameters

  • request –

  • form (QueryForm) – The form used for requesting information

  • course (Course) – relevant course

attendance.views.course_lecture(request, course_name, pk)[source]¶

Renders the attendance info for all the students corresponding to a lecture

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

  • pk (int) – The primary key for the lecture

attendance.views.course_lectures(request, course_name)[source]¶

Renders all the lectures for a course along with attendance status

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

attendance.views.course_schedule(request, course_name)[source]¶

Renders the form for scheduling a lecture for a course and schedules it

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

attendance.views.course_student(request, course_name, pk)[source]¶

Renders the attendance info for a student in a course

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

  • pk (int) – The primary key for the student

attendance.views.course_students(request, course_name)[source]¶

Renders the attendance info for all the students in the course

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

attendance.views.export_as_csv(request, course_name)[source]¶

Returns the CSV file for the attendance in course

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

attendance.views.home(request)[source]¶

Renders a homepage for every type of user.

Parameters

request –

attendance.views.my_courses(request)[source]¶

Renders all the courses in which the student has enrolled

Parameters

request –

attendance.views.student_course(request, course_name)[source]¶

Renders the lecture-wise attendance info for a student

Parameters

  • request –

  • course_name (str) – The name of course

attendance.views.teacher_course(request, course_name)[source]¶

Renders the homepage for a course

Parameters

  • course_name (str) – The name of course
